entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
